item.title: 格尔道第二季度调整后利润下降近 9%，关税促进美国业务发展
item.description: 巴西钢铁制造商格尔道（Gerdau）周四公布的第二季度调整后净利润同比下降8.6%，略低于分析师预期，尽管北美业务因美国关税而表现强劲。【原文：Brazilian steelmaker Gerdau on Thursday reported an 8.6% decline in its second-quarter adjusted net profit year-on-year, slightly below analysts' expectations despite stronger performance of North American operations due to U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 法国 7 月新车注册量下降 7.66%，特斯拉销量下降 26.57
item.description: 法国汽车机构PFA周五公布的数据显示，7月份法国新车注册量为116377辆，同比下滑7.66%。【原文：New car registrations in France slid 7.66% in July from a year earlier to 116,377 vehicles, data from French car body PFA showed on Friday.】

item.title: 日本 6 月失业率维持在 2.5% 不变
item.description: 日本政府周五公布的数据显示，日本 6 月份的失业率为 2.5%，与上月持平。【原文：Japan's jobless rate in June was unchanged from the previous month at 2.5%, government data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普对数十个国家的出口产品征收 10%至 41%的 "对等 "关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，对从数十个国家和外国地区进口的美国商品征收10%至41%不等的互惠关税。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday imposing reciprocal tariffs ranging from 10% to 41% on U.S. imports from dozens of countries and foreign locations.】

item.title: 白宫表示，特朗普将对加拿大的关税提高至 35
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项行政命令，将对加拿大商品征收的关税从25%提高到35%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday increasing tariffs on Canadian goods to 35% from 25%, the White House said.】

item.title: 由于佣金和费用增加，Arthur J. Gallagher 的季度利润上升
item.description: 本周四，Arthur J. Gallagher 公布第二季度利润增长，主要得益于强劲的保险支出导致公司佣金和费用增加。【原文：Arthur J. Gallagher reported a rise in second-quarter profit on Thursday, supported by strong insurance spending that led to higher commissions and fees for the company.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特朗普就房利美和房地美股票发行寻求银行主管的支持
item.description: 彭博新闻社周四援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道称，唐纳德-特朗普总统正在与美国主要银行的负责人会面，讨论抵押贷款巨头房利美和房地美货币化的问题。【原文：President Donald Trump is meeting with chiefs of major U.S. banks to discuss monetizing mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国陆军将合同汇集成高达 100 亿美元的 Palantir 交易
item.description: 美国陆军周四表示，它正在将数十份合同合并为与 Palantir 的单一企业协议，从而获得基于数量的折扣，并可在 10 年内从这家软件供应商购买高达 100 亿美元的产品。【原文：The U.S. Army on Thursday said it was consolidating dozens of contracts into a single enterprise deal with Palantir , giving it volume-based discounts and the option to purchase up to $10 billion from the software provider over 10 years.】

item.title: 信中称，雷-达里奥出售桥水公司剩余股份
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封寄给该基金投资者的信，投资者雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）出售了他在桥水联合基金（Bridgewater Associates）的剩余股份，该基金是他在 50 年前创立的对冲基金。【原文：Investor Ray Dalio sold his remaining stake in Bridgewater Associates, the hedge fund he founded 50 years ago, according to a letter sent to the fund's investors and seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 西南航空公司任命道格-布鲁克斯为董事会主席
item.description: 美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）周四表示，已任命内部人士道格-布鲁克斯（Doug Brooks）为董事会主席，8 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Southwest Airlines said on Thursday it has named insider Doug Brooks as chairperson of its board, effective August 1.】

item.title: 菲利普斯 66 在生物燃料商业机密案中被罚 8 亿美元
item.description: 根据加利福尼亚州法院的一份文件，美国炼油商菲利普斯 66 公司（Phillips 66）被勒令向生物燃料制造商 Propel Fuels 公司支付 8 亿美元的赔偿金，原因是该公司为建立可再生燃料能力而窃取了商业机密。【原文：U.S. refiner Phillips 66 was ordered to pay biofuel maker Propel Fuels $800 million in damages for stealing trade secrets to build up its renewable-fuel capabilities, according to a California state court document.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司如何在特朗普的关税闪电战中安然无恙
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司周三躲过一劫，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在对许多巴西商品征收更高的关税时，将飞机排除在外，使这家飞机制造商的收入免于遭受类似大流行病的潜在打击。【原文：Embraer dodged a bullet on Wednesday when U.S. President Donald Trump excluded aircraft from the steeper tariffs he imposed on many Brazilian goods, sparing the planemaker from a potential pandemic-like hit to its revenue.】

item.title: 联合健康任命 Wayne DeVeydt 为首席财务官，管理层再次调整
item.description: 联合健康（UnitedHealth）周四表示，将从外部聘请韦恩-德维特（Wayne DeVeydt）接替其财务总监约翰-雷克斯（John Rex），这也是这家一直在努力控制医疗成本的健康保险公司管理层变动的一部分。【原文：UnitedHealth said on Thursday it will replace its finance chief John Rex with an external hire, Wayne DeVeydt, adding to the management changes at the health insurer that has been struggling to control its medical costs.】

item.title: 赛勒战略公司在加密货币淘金热中实现季度盈利
item.description: 战略公司周四公布了六个季度以来的首次盈利报告，比特币最大的企业持有者受益于加密货币的一个显著季度。【原文：Strategy reported its first profit in six quarters on Thursday, as the biggest corporate holder of bitcoin benefited from a remarkable quarter for cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 交易日：是什么阻止了科技巨轮？
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: KLA 预测第一季度收入高于预期，但指出中国市场疲软
item.description: KLA 公司周四预测第一季度营收将高于华尔街预期，预计人工智能处理器的蓬勃需求将推动其芯片制造设备的销售。【原文：KLA Corp forecast first-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, expecting booming demand for AI processors to drive sales of its chipmaking equipment.】

item.title: 富国银行董事会将任命首席执行官沙尔夫为董事长
item.description: 美国大型银行富国银行周四表示，董事会打算任命首席执行官查理-沙尔夫（Charlie Scharf）担任董事长。【原文：Major U.S. lender Wells Fargo said on Thursday its board of directors intends to appoint CEO Charlie Scharf as chairman.】

item.title: 云计算需求强劲，DXC上调年度预期
item.description: IT 服务公司 DXC Technology 周四上调了年度收入和利润预期，原因是企业对其基于云的解决方案的支出保持稳定。【原文：IT services company DXC Technology raised its annual revenue and profit forecast on Thursday, driven by steady enterprise spending on its cloud-based solutions.】

item.title: 卢特尼克表示，加拿大仍有可能被征收 35% 的关税
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周四表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）规定的8月1日最后期限到来之前，美国仍 "肯定会对美墨加贸易协定未涵盖的所有加拿大商品征收35%的关税"。【原文：U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Thursday that a 35% tariff on all Canadian goods not covered by the U.S.-Mexico-Canada trade agreement is still "surely in the cards," ahead of an Aug. 1 deadline imposed by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，CSX 与高盛合作探索战略选择
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，铁路运营商 CSX 正在与高盛（Goldman Sachs）合作，探讨两大竞争对手合并后的战略选择。【原文：Railroad operator CSX is working with Goldman Sachs to explore strategic options following a merger between its two major rivals, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: First Solar 上调年度销售展望，预计关税将导致价格上涨
item.description: First Solar 周四上调了年度销售预期，因为这家美国太阳能电池板制造商预计，在对外国制造的电池板征收额外关税后，其产品价格将上涨。【原文：First Solar raised its annual sales forecast on Thursday, as the U.S. solar panel maker expects higher prices for its products following additional tariffs on foreign-made panels.】

item.title: iPhone 销量飙升，苹果超出华尔街预期
item.description: 苹果公司周四公布的销售额和利润远超预期，这表明苹果公司为摆脱美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战而重新规划其庞大的全球供应链所做的努力迄今已取得成功。【原文：Apple on Thursday reported sales and profit that far surpassed expectations, showing that its efforts to re-route its sprawling global supply chain away from U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war have so far succeeded.】

item.title: 得益于人工智能需求，Monolithic Power 预计第三季度营收高于预期
item.description: 本周四，Monolithic Power Systems 预测第三季度营收将高于预期，该公司押注于人工智能生成推动数据中心扩张对其电源控制产品和半导体的强劲需求。【原文：Monolithic Power Systems forecast third-quarter revenue above estimates on Thursday, betting on strong demand for its power control products and semiconductors as generative artificial intelligence drives data center expansion.】

item.title: 订阅收入增加，Coinbase 季度利润飙升
item.description: Coinbase Global 周四公布第二季度利润大幅增长，原因是其订阅和服务业务的收益抵消了交易收入的下滑。【原文：Coinbase Global reported a sharp rise in second-quarter profit on Thursday, as gains in its subscription and services business offset a dip in trading revenue.】

item.title: Roku 第二季度营收超出预期，股价上涨
item.description: 受用户群扩大和广告销售的帮助，Roku 周四的第二季度营收超过了华尔街的预期，使其股价在盘后交易中上涨了 8%。【原文：Roku topped Wall Street estimates for second-quarter revenue on Thursday, helped by its expanding user base and advertising sales, sending its shares up 8% in trading after the bell.】

item.title: Reddit 预测人工智能驱动的广告力量将带来强劲收入，股价大涨
item.description: Reddit 周四预计第三季度营收将高于华尔街预期，押注于人工智能营销工具推动的数字广告业务增长，股价在盘后交易中上涨 9%。【原文：Reddit forecast third-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, betting on growing digital advertising driven by its artificial intelligence-powered marketing tools and sending its shares up 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: 路明缩小亏损，因节税而上调自由现金流预期
item.description: 流明技术公司（Lumen Technologies）周四公布的第二季度亏损小于预期，并将全年自由现金流预期上调了 60% 以上，这得益于特朗普总统减税法案带来的成本节约。【原文：Lumen Technologies on Thursday reported a smaller-than-expected second-quarter loss and raised its full-year free cash flow forecast by more than 60%, helped by cost savings from President Trump's tax cut legislation.】

item.title: 派拉蒙全球公司在出售给 Skydance 之前实现了盈利目标
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）周四公布的第二季度财报超过了华尔街的预期，该公司正在为出售给 Skydance Media 做准备。【原文：Paramount Global posted second-quarter earnings that exceeded Wall Street estimates on Thursday as the company prepares for a sale to Skydance Media.】

item.title: 亚马逊云计算业绩不佳，盘后股价下跌
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周四预计第三季度销售额将高于市场预期，但在竞争对手大幅超出预期后，亚马逊网络服务（Amazon Web Services）云计算部门的业绩未能达到人们的高预期。【原文：Amazon.com forecast third-quarter sales above market estimates on Thursday but failed to live up to lofty expectations for its Amazon Web Services cloud computing unit after rivals handily beat expectations.】

item.title: 巴西企业对特朗普关税的反应既欣慰又怀疑
item.description: 白宫周三出人意料地公布了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普自8月6日起对巴西出口产品征收50%关税的近700个例外情况清单，巴西企业对此既感到欣慰又心存疑虑。【原文：Brazilian companies reacted with a mix of relief and doubt after the White House surprised them on Wednesday with a list of nearly 700 exceptions to the 50% tariff U.S. President Donald Trump imposed on the country's exports from August 6.】
